channel.title: Jerry Jones on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jerry Jones on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘America’s Team: The Gambler’ Directors Go Deep on Their Time With Jerry Jones, the “Willy Wonka of the NFL”
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter asks brothers Chapman and Maclain Way — and Netflix VP of sports, Gabe Spitzer — just why the streamer loves the Dallas Cowboys so damn much.
